metadata.title: CVE-2023-31084 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in drivers/media/dvb-core/dvb_frontend.c in theLinux kernel 6.2. There is a blocking operation when a task is in!TASK_RUNNING. In dvb_frontend_get_event, wait_event_interruptible iscalled; the condition is dvb_frontend_test_event(fepriv,events). Indvb_frontend_test_event, down(&fepriv->sem) is called. However,wait_event_interruptible would put the process to sleep, anddown(&fepriv->sem) may block the process.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31084` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-32-generic - 6.2.0-32.32
